name: Spot The Spy!
description:
A Board Game to have fun with friends!
A Spy is hiding among you. Will you be able to find him?
Start asking questions to each other, but watch out for the answers that will be given to you, the Spy is listening!

With Spot The Spy you can play from 3 to an infinite number of players, a real board game, always with you, to play at home with friends, at the beach, wherever you are!

Easy, fast and intuitive, the app will allow you to go into secret places, but among you there will be spies, unaware of the scenario in which the game is taking place.
By asking each other questions you will need to understand who is with you in the designated place, and who instead is the spy who is trying to steal information from your questions and answers.
With more than 60 different locations available, each game will surprise you more and more.

A game for children and adults, for all ages!
